name: part_002
file: tmp_【#SSholoX】世界征服に向けて…【3Dアジトお披露目】 [aGp1Q3aH_Bk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: A recap of Sakamata Chloe's 3D debut, showing her performing with sharks and singing 'Ghost of the Sea'.
The members discuss Chloe's 3D debut in the studio, joking about her playing with sharks.
A recap of Hakui Koyori's 3D debut, featuring her singing 'Don't Decide My Limits Yourself'.
The members discuss Koyori's 3D debut, praising her dance and the appearance of her 'imaginary tail'.
A recap of Takane Lui's 3D debut, showing her performing 'One Night Carnival'.
The members discuss Lui's 3D debut, specifically the inclusion of a group illustration and Chloe's letter.
A recap of La+ Darknesss' 3D debut, featuring her 'VLOG in Kyoto' and singing 'Gasshou Gousei'.
The members conclude the review by praising Laplus' unique VLOG-style 3D debut.

subtitles.original: ああ、これは… これは違うよね
subtitles.english: Ah, this... this isn't right, is it?

subtitles.original: ずっと沙花叉と戯れてるじゃん
subtitles.english: You're just playing with Sakamata all the time.

subtitles.original: やばいやばいやばい
subtitles.english: Oh no, oh no, oh no!

subtitles.original: よかったね、美しい
subtitles.english: That was good, so pretty.

subtitles.original: うん、本当によかったよね
subtitles.english: Yeah, it was really good.

subtitles.original: 沙花叉のなんかギャップっていうのが、よかったよね
subtitles.english: Sakamata's, like, gap was really good, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: ライブパートはめっちゃよかった
subtitles.english: The live part was awesome.

subtitles.original: でもね、沙花叉さんと戯れてる姿もね、よかったでござる
subtitles.english: But seeing you play with Sakamata-san was also good.

subtitles.original: よかったよね！
subtitles.english: It was good, wasn't it!

subtitles.original: 水淀んでる感じがあれよね、すごくよかった
subtitles.english: That murky water feeling was really good.

subtitles.original: 反復横跳びが… よかった
subtitles.english: The side-to-side jumps were... good.

subtitles.original: きもいきもい！ありえなーい！ありえなーい！
subtitles.english: Gross, gross! No way! No way!

subtitles.original: 次行くか
subtitles.english: Shall we move to the next one?

subtitles.original: じゃあ次は博士のやつ見ようかな
subtitles.english: Let's watch the Doctor's next.

subtitles.original: 見てください！
subtitles.english: Please watch!

subtitles.original: これ可愛い。絶対可愛かったんだよね
subtitles.english: This is cute. That was definitely cute, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: 健全す… 健全すぎよ
subtitles.english: Whole... too wholesome.

subtitles.original: 嘘！嘘つけ！
subtitles.english: Liar! You're lying!

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃよかったよね。めっちゃ感動したよ
subtitles.english: That was amazing. I was really moved.

subtitles.original: 今回はね、ダンスめちゃくちゃ頑張ったから
subtitles.english: She worked really hard on the dance this time.

subtitles.original: すごかった！
subtitles.english: It was amazing!

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと尻尾振ってたんだよね
subtitles.english: My tail was wagging the whole time.

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ可愛いんだ。イマジナリー尻尾が振ってるかのような
subtitles.english: It's so cute. Like an imaginary tail was wagging.

subtitles.original: 初めてのオリジナル曲だからでも嬉しい、仲間に戻ってもらえて
subtitles.english: It's my first original song, so I'm happy to have everyone back together.

subtitles.original: 見てください！
subtitles.english: Please watch it!

subtitles.original: じゃあ次最後に幹部見ようか
subtitles.english: Next, let's watch the Officer last.

subtitles.original: 見ましょう
subtitles.english: Let's watch.

subtitles.original: でももう記憶に新しいんじゃないかな
subtitles.english: But it's probably still fresh in your memory, right?

subtitles.original: 最近だね
subtitles.english: It was recent.

subtitles.original: じたばたしないの！
subtitles.english: Don't struggle!

subtitles.original: じたばたする悪い子はお仕置きがあるよ
subtitles.english: Bad kids who struggle will get a punishment.

subtitles.original: お仕置きください！
subtitles.english: Please punish me!

subtitles.original: もみもみしないの
subtitles.english: Don't squeeze!

subtitles.original: イラストもめっちゃ嬉しかった
subtitles.english: I was so happy about the illustration too.

subtitles.original: やっぱりね、あの憧れのステージでみんなで立ちたいなっていう夢があって
subtitles.english: After all, I had a dream of standing on that stage I've long admired with everyone.

subtitles.original: ちょっとみんなを出したいなと思ってイラストをちょっとね
subtitles.english: I wanted to include everyone, so I had that illustration made.

subtitles.original: やばいそれは
subtitles.english: That's crazy.

subtitles.original: やっぱり私もね、夢を見たいから、みんなで夢を見たいなっていうことで、ああいう演出にさせていただきました
subtitles.english: After all, I want to dream too, so I wanted to dream with everyone, which is why I made that kind of production.

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃよかった
subtitles.english: It was so good.

subtitles.original: 沙花叉のお手紙もよかったよ
subtitles.english: Chloe's letter was good too.

subtitles.original: やばいから！みんなが泣いちゃう
subtitles.english: It's dangerous! Everyone will cry.

subtitles.original: ぜひアーカイブで見てください
subtitles.english: Please watch the archive.

subtitles.original: そして何か先ほど最後って言ってたけどね
subtitles.english: And although I said "the last" just now...

subtitles.original: うちの総帥も素晴らしい3Dお披露目をしているので
subtitles.english: Our Leader also had a wonderful 3D debut.

subtitles.original: 見ようや
subtitles.english: Let's watch it.

subtitles.original: ラプラスのVTRどうぞ
subtitles.english: Here is La+ Darknesss' VTR.

subtitles.original: なんで？なんで笑うの？
subtitles.english: Why? Why are you laughing?

subtitles.original: 京都！ラプラスとのデートじゃん
subtitles.english: Kyoto! It's a date with Laplus.

subtitles.original: これ一番センシティブじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't this the most sensitive part?

subtitles.original: 何も見えてないから
subtitles.english: You can't see anything.

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃよかったよね
subtitles.english: It was amazing.

subtitles.original: やっぱりね、VLOG撮れたのがよかった
subtitles.english: After all, I'm glad I could film the VLOG.

subtitles.original: 今までにない3Dお披露目だったよね
subtitles.english: It was a 3D debut like never before.

subtitles.original: ずっと前からありたいって言ってたことができたから
subtitles.english: I was able to do what I'd been saying I wanted to do for a long time.

subtitles.original: 暇だったら見てよ
subtitles.english: Watch it if you're free.

subtitles.original: 見てください！
subtitles.english: Please watch it!
